What are the treatments for Klippel-Trenaunay Syndrome (KTS) ?,"There is no cure for KTS. Treatment is symptomatic. Laser surgery can diminish or erase some skin lesions. Surgery may correct discrepancies in limb size, but orthopedic devices may be more appropriate.",NINDS,Klippel-Trenaunay Syndrome (KTS)
